item.title: Welcome to Scamurai
item.description:
🥷🏼🤖 Scamurai is your vigilant scam-fighting bot.

It posts concise scam alerts sourced from official organizations to keep you and your loved ones protected from online scams and fraud.

Follow our Mastodon feed for real-time alerts.

Stay safe out there!

item.title: About Scamurai
item.description:
Scamurai is a public service bot created by Shailendra Singh to raise awareness about online scams, frauds, and phishing attacks.

It aggregates alerts from trusted sources like the FTC and IC3, summarizes them concisely for quick reading, and posts them to Mastodon and this website.

🛡️ Knowledge is your first line of defense.

👉 Follow us on Mastodon: @scamurai_bot
🔗 Connect with the creator on LinkedIn: Shailendra Singh
